triggers: Plugin 'ProjectKorra' is creating timing '[A-Za-z#_ -.]{3,40}' - this is deprecated behavior, please report it to the authors: ProjectKorra
response:
This is caused by Paper changing something in their software that broke ProjectKorra.

To mute the spam, use the latest beta build of ProjectKorra. This can be gotten by picking up the 'Beta Tester' role from <#752661673877176411>, which will give you access to the beta builds in <#922939387635957800>.
